result.reason: User requests improved UX for panel resizing and snapping; current implementation has hardcoded splitter size overrides that may be insufficient or inconsistent, and snapping behavior (docking) may need tuning.
result.approach: Make splitter size configurable in options (removing hardcoded 10px override if preferred) and investigate enabling better snapping/docking behaviors in DockPanelSuite configuration.
